post.text:
Donald Trump says he'll create a new test for immigrants.

It's a test he'd fail.

comment.author: Madison
comment.text: thank God there is someone in this race smart enough to recognize the danger of importing more jihadist, ISLAMIC terrorist. The "progressives" are too stupid to realize what evil they are importing to America. #nevercrookedhillary

replies.author: Mikaela
replies.text: Your profile picture is the perfect choice for you .
